TEXT.TITLE: COLOMBIA TO SELL SUGAR, LONDON TRADERS SAY
TEXT.BODY: Colombia is holding a snap selling tender tonight for one cargo of world market raw sugar, traders said. The sugar is for March 15/April 15 shipment and bids are being sought based on the New York May delivery futures contract, they added. Reuter
